pkgmetadata.longdescription: PyOpenCAP is an open-source package aimed at extending the capabilities of electronic structure packages to describe metastable electronic states. Currently supported electronic structure packages are:- Q-Chem- OpenMolcas- PySCF- Psi4- ColumbusCurrently available features:- Box and Voronoi CAPs- Trajectory analysis toolsAll PyOpenCAP wheels distributed on PyPi are MIT licensed.
